definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: They also tend to increase the formation of tropical storms in the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 此外還增加了在大西洋海域熱帶風暴的形成。

sentences.english: Tropical Storm Fay is moving northeast after making landfalls in southwest Florida.
sentences.chinese: 熱帶風暴“菲”在佛羅里達西南登陸後，向東北移動。

sentences.english: Tropical Storm Nate makes landfall in Mexico's Veracruz state.
sentences.chinese: 熱帶風暴內特在墨西哥的韋拉克魯斯州登陸。

sentences.english: HKO assessed Neoguri weakened into a tropical storm before making landfall on Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 天文臺指浣熊在登陸廣東前減弱爲熱帶風暴。

sentences.english: Residents in South Florida are getting a taste of what Tropical Strom Fay has in store .
sentences.chinese: 南佛羅里達居民正在感受熱帶風暴菲的到來。

sentences.english: Durian has been downgraded to a tropical storm and is heading west across the Gulf of Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 榴蓮已經降級爲熱帶風暴，正穿過泰國灣向西移動。

sentences.english: Tropical Storm Arthur is spinning off the coast of Belize.
sentences.chinese: 熱帶風暴“亞瑟”登入了伯利茲城海岸。

sentences.english: The weather was a result of Tropical Storm Doria. (AP Photo)
sentences.chinese: 罪魁禍首便是熱帶風暴多利亞。

sentences.english: A tropical storm warning was issued from Cape Fear to Bogue Inlet, North Carolina.
sentences.chinese: 而從恐怖角到伯格灣地區則會發布熱帶風暴警告。

sentences.english: There is going to be a tropical storm in the East China sea.
sentences.chinese: 明天東瀛海域將有一場熱帶風暴。

definition: Spratly Islands, disputed between China, Malaysia, the Philippines, Taiwan and Vietnam
Tun District – area of Taichung (in Taiwan) between the coastal (western) part of the city and the mountains to the east
an express train sets off/fig. to work in haste/to rush

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1

definition: Chiatung township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
fire ant (Solenopsis invicta), an introduced species in China
